characters.name: Vin
characters.description: A wary street urchin who discovers she’s a Mistborn; cautious, observant, and learning to trust.

characters.name: Kelsier
characters.description: A charismatic Mistborn rebel leader known as “The Survivor,” aiming to overthrow the Lord Ruler.

characters.name: Lord Ruler
characters.description: The immortal, god‑like tyrant ruling the Final Empire for a thousand years.

characters.name: Dockson
characters.description: Kelsier’s calm, organized right‑hand man who handles logistics—but isn’t an Allomancer.

characters.name: Ham (Hammond)
characters.description: A strong Pewter‑arm Thug; grounded, thoughtful, and protective of the crew.

characters.name: Breeze
characters.description: A smooth‑talking Soother who manipulates moods; strategic and often lighthearted.

characters.name: Clubs
characters.description: A copper‑burning Smoker and ex‑army carpenter; practical, blunt, dependable.

characters.name: Spook (Lestibournes)
characters.description: The youngest crew member; a Tin‑burning Tineye with heightened senses and street slang.

characters.name: Sazed
characters.description: A gentle Terrisman Keeper and Feruchemist preserving lore and multiple religions.

characters.name: Elend Venture
characters.description: An idealistic nobleman of House Venture; scholarly, reform-minded, intrigued by Vin.

characters.name: Yeden
characters.description: A skaa rebel leader seeking alliances; principled, cautious, wary of betrayal.

characters.name: Marsh
characters.description: Kelsier’s brother; once allied with him, now silent and intense with an uncertain role.

characters.name: Marsh (Steel Inquisitor)
characters.description: Marsh has transformed into a Steel Inquisitor—powerful, emotionless, and terrifying.

characters.name: Lord Renoux (Imposter / Kandra)
characters.description: A noble ally of the crew—polite and helpful, though not quite what he seems.

characters.name: Straff Venture
characters.description: Elend’s father and head of House Venture; imposing, proud, politically powerful.

characters.name: Shan Elariel
characters.description: A Mistborn and Elend’s fiancée at the start—proper, poised, with a hidden strength.

characters.name: Allrianne Cett
characters.description: Daughter of Lord Ashweather Cett; playful, fashionable, and romantically linked to Breeze.

characters.name: OreSeur (Kandra)
characters.description: A kandra bound to Lord Renoux and later to Vin; quiet, observant, and capable of mimicry.
